6 #Header Header

Toggle example guides Toggle HTML markup

Header is displayed at the top of the page and it consists of logo, title and menu.

Example
Skip to main content
Code
Line
Daily
  • Home
  • Archive
  • Evergreen
  • About
Markup 
<div class="hf">
  <div class="w w--beta hf__inner">
    <a class="hf__skip" href="#main">Skip to main content</a>
    <div class="hf__logo">
      <span class="hf__img">
        <img class="hf__src" src="/gfx/svg/cld-logo.svg">
      </span>
      <span class="hf__cld">Code <br>Line <br>Daily</h1>
    </div>
    <nav class="hf__nav">
      <ul class="hf__list">
        <li class="hf__item">
          <a class="hf__link active" href="#home">Home</a>
        </li>
        <li class="hf__item">
          <a class="hf__link" href="#archive">Archive</a>
        </li>
        <li class="hf__item">
          <a class="hf__link" href="#evergreen">Evergreen</a>
        </li>
        <li class="hf__item">
          <a class="hf__link" href="#about">About</a>
        </li>
      </ul>
    </nav>
  </div>
</div>
